comment: The app (usually) is fine enough for accessing Pinterest, but any time something is amiss, there's no way to report bugs from within the app. Plus, it seems that recently they added a strange clicking sound only when hitting the button to save a post to your boards while viewing the post directly, with no way to turn it off despite there being no other audio in the app outside of watching videos.
scenarios: Unable to report bugs from within the app when something is amiss.
Hitting the button to save a post to boards while viewing the post directly produces a strange clicking sound with no way to turn it off.
key sentence: Hitting the button to save a post to boards while viewing the post directly produces a strange clicking sound with no way to turn it off.
the function of activity: Activity involves searching, accessing menus, filtering, viewing various content categories, managing pins, profiles, settings, creating, sharing, and navigating within the interface.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'View Image', 'description': 'View a larger version of an image or pin on the screen.'}, {'name': 'Save Pin', 'description': 'Save a pin or item to a collection or board for later reference.'}, {'name': 'Share', 'description': 'Share content via various platforms or methods such as social media or messaging.'}, {'name': 'View Comments', 'description': 'Read and engage with comments associated with a pin or post.'}]

comment: The app (usually) is fine enough for accessing Pinterest, but any time something is amiss, there's no way to report bugs from within the app. Plus, it seems that recently they added a strange clicking sound only when hitting the button to save a post to your boards while viewing the post directly, with no way to turn it off despite there being no other audio in the app outside of watching videos.
scenarios: Unable to report bugs from within the app when something is amiss.
Hitting the button to save a post to boards while viewing the post directly produces a strange clicking sound with no way to turn it off.
key sentence: Hitting the button to save a post to boards while viewing the post directly produces a strange clicking sound with no way to turn it off.
the function of activity: Activity involves searching, accessing menus, filtering, viewing various content categories, managing pins, profiles, settings, creating, sharing, and navigating within the interface.
